NAME: Currency
DESC: Generates a random currency value in whatever format and range you need.
helpIntro: This data type generates random currency values in whatever format and range you want. The example dropdown contains several options so you can get a sense of how it works, but here's what each of the options means.
rangeFromDesc: Specifies the lower range of whatever values you want to generate.
rangeToDesc: The upper range of the numbers to generate.
currencySymbolDesc: Whatever currency symbol you want to use, e.g. $, â‚¬, etc.
prefixSuffixDesc: This determines where the currency symbol should appear.
separatorsDesc: The separators field lets you customize the thousands and cents separator characters.
